title: Michigan St. Spartans News, Scores and Stats 2025-26 - CBS Sports
text: In Progress Big Ten Standings Schedule - 1:03 CBB Seed Line Implications: 5 Illinois at 10 Michigan State - 1:59 Michigan State traveling to Minnesota to face 'well-coached' Golden Gophers - 3:06 TMI - Michigan Basketball Presser - Elliot Cadeau breaks down Michigan's big win at rival Michigan State - 3:03 TMI - Michigan Basketball Presser - Trey McKenney reacts to Michigan's big win over rival Michigan State - 2:28 TMI - Michigan Basketball Postgame Recap - Sam and Josh talk Michigan's 83-71 win over rival Michigan State - 1:32 'We just couldn't get over the hump': Tom Izzo reacts to MSU's 83-71 loss to Michigan - 1:22 Michigan St Still A Top-10 Team Following Loss To Michigan - 1:53 No. 3 Michigan Gets Well-Rounded Win At No. 7 Michigan State - 1:10 Top Defenses Clash in East Lansing - 1:01 Michigan at Michigan State: Dusty May vs Tom Izzo - 1:26 What to Expect From No. 3 Michigan at No. 7 Michigan State - 1:28 What To Watch For In Michigan - Michigan State? - 1:02 Michigan State HC Tom Izzo disagrees with forthcoming Michigan high school NIL rules - 1:53 Michigan 'probably the most talented team' Michigan State will face in regular season, Izzo says - 1:49 Izzo telling Spartans a true road game at Rutgers is nothing to overlook - 1:27 No. 7 Michigan State going on the road to face 'new-look' Rutgers squad - 1:10 Big 12 & Big Ten Continue To Dominate AP Poll - 2:28 Michigan State had 'one of those days' in blowout home win over Maryland - 1:14 Big Ten Outlook For Michigan State - 0:56 Jeremy Fears Jr. Leads Michigan State to Victory Over Maryland This page may contain affiliate links.
